entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
